functions.name: Copy
functions.logic: Copies the digits from X to Z. If Z and X are the same, it returns. It pads Z with zeros if Z is longer than X.

functions.name: LeftShift
functions.logic: Shifts the digits in X to the left by 'shift' bits and stores the result in Z. It handles the carry-over between digits. It pads Z with zeros if required.

functions.name: RightShift
functions.logic: Shifts the digits in X to the right by 'shift' bits and stores the result in Z. It handles the carry-over between digits. It pads Z with zeros if required.
